scripts.assets:build: cd functions && GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -tags lambda.norpc -o build/bootstrap ./assets-metadata
scripts.static:pull: wrangler kv:key list --binding KV_STATIC_DATA | jq -r '.[].name' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'echo ./app/statics/{} && wrangler kv:key get --binding KV_STATIC_DATA {} > app/statics/{}'
scripts.static:push: find ./app/statics -type f -exec sh -c 'echo {} && wrangler kv:key put --binding KV_STATIC_DATA --path {} $(basename {})' \;
scripts.static:push:dev: find ./app/statics -type f -exec sh -c 'echo {} && wrangler kv:key put --binding KV_STATIC_DATA --local --path {} $(basename {})' \;
